docs.title: Executive Summary
docs.text:
Strategic and results-driven executive with a proven record in leading innovation, enterprise architecture, and global partnerships. As the Global Co-Lead for SAP AppHaus Network Partners and SAP Enterprise Architect, I drive SAP’s innovation strategy, enabling business transformation with AI, Generative AI, and the SAP Business Technology Platform (BTP).

Notable achievements include supporting Cirque du Soleil’s Accounts Payable transformation using Business AI, and leading API integration efforts for successful production rollout. I’ve fostered high-impact collaborations across North America, EMEA, MEE, APJ, and ANZ, consistently delivering exceptional value. Recognized three times as an SAP Catalyst Employee, I am dedicated to shaping the future of enterprise technology through human-centered design, innovation, and scalable cloud architectures.

docs.title: 📬 Contact
docs.text:
If you'd like to get in touch, feel free to reach out through any of the following:

  • 📧 Primary Email: estalav@gmail.com
  • 📧 Secondary Email: carlos@estala.io
  • 🔗 LinkedIn: linkedin.com/in/carlos-estala
  • 🌐 Website: www.estala.com

docs.title: Education & Certifications
docs.text:
• Master’s in Information Systems
  • Bachelor’s in Business Management
  • SAP Enterprise Architecture

docs.title: SAP Labs LLC (2024–Present)
docs.text: Global Co-Lead, SAP AppHaus & Enterprise Architect  - Led global strategy for SAP AppHaus Network, enabling innovation through SAP BTP. - Established co-innovation spaces in Houston, Minneapolis, and LATAM. - Architected Business AI workshops and Generative AI integrations. - Supported major customers (e.g., Cirque du Soleil) with API-based system integrations. - Prepared SAP Innovation Awards and SAPPHIRE 2025 content.

docs.title: SAP Labs LLC (2023–2024)
docs.text: Regional Lead for NA & LAC  - Extended partner networks across North and Latin America. - Delivered AI transformation initiatives for NBA, Mercado Libre, Petrobras, Claro. - Launched internal and external workshops to enable AI readiness.

docs.title: SAP Labs LLC (2018–2023)
docs.text: Principal Consultant, GCS  - Championed cloud adoption using GCP and SAP BTP. - Built observability platforms integrating Dynatrace, Kyma, and Splunk. - Introduced AIOps automation via Terraform and StackStorm.

docs.title: SAP Labs LLC (2013–2018)
docs.text: Senior Consultant, GCS  - Managed ERP/BW/PI/PO migrations for SAP Palo Alto. - Delivered PoCs supporting SAP HANA launch. - Reduced incident response time via PagerDuty + ServiceNow integrations.

docs.title: SAP Mexico (2010–2013)
docs.text: Technical Quality Manager  - Delivered transformation projects for Coca-Cola Femsa and Palacio de Hierro. - Specialized in SAP HANA, AGS services, and virtualization.

docs.title: SAP Mexico (2007–2010)
docs.text: SAP Contractor / Global DBA  - Provided global DB support for SAP Hosting (Germany, US). - Led Unicode migrations and SAP installations.

docs.title: Stellantis (2002–2007)
docs.text: E-Business & DBA  - Migrated legacy enterprise systems to scalable cloud-based architecture.

docs.title: Moredata (2001–2002)
docs.text: Developer / DB Specialist  - Built web solutions for Portugal Telecom, supporting early innovation in Mexico.

docs.title: Intelligas (2000–2001)
docs.text: Linux & DB Specialist  - Developed logistics tools using Informix and RF tech.

docs.title: Key Competencies
docs.text:
• Executive Leadership & Global Strategy
  • AI & Generative AI Innovation
  • Cloud Solutions & SAP BTP
  • Partner Ecosystem Development
  • Design Thinking & Human-Centered Innovation
  • Business Process Optimization
  • Hyperscaler Integration (Google Cloud, AWS, Azure)
  • High-Profile Stakeholder Engagement
